description: Isle of Man Foodbank says it anticipates a rise in holiday hunger due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
title: Isle of Man Foodbank welcomes meal voucher scheme extension
title_page: Isle of Man Foodbank welcomes meal voucher scheme extension - BBC News
maintext: He said the charity would work with the government to understand "the nature and extent of holiday hunger" and explore "how together we might arrive at a longer term solution".
